About

mrspuff is a collection of teaching tools for deep learning, intended to work well on Google Colab and interface with fast.ai.

Install

pip install mrspuff

How to use

This is still under development, not ready for widespread public use yet.

If you want to try it, you may either import individual routines, as in

from mrspuff.viz import image_and_bars

or import the whole package and access its submodules, e.g.:

import mrspuff as msp

p, t = msp.utils.calc_prob()
